title: Cowboy Romance: My Billionaire Rancher (Free Romance Story Included)
description: My Billionaire RancherBrooke Anderson was hot. More than just sweaty, she was overheated to the point that drinking like a camel might just quench her thirst, maybe. In the middle of July the Texas sun was beating even the will to wake up out of her and keeping up appearances became her only survival. As one of very few women working in a male super-dominated world of ranching, Brooke was out to prove that not only could she keep up, she could outrun, outwork and outgun any man who stood in her way. It wasn’t about making a name for herself. As an Anderson her name was already solid in their community. However, as the only Anderson girl, she was out to make back the money her parent’s had lost on their own ranch. With bankruptcy looming huge in her parents horizon, Brooke needed to make some serious cash and fast, to save what little was left of her parent’s home and farm....
author: J.J. Fox
